sections.heading: In-depth analysis
content: The Equivalent Economic Situation Indicator (ISEE) is a numerical value that certifies the economic situation of a household in Italy. It is used by public and private entities to determine access to social benefits, such as scholarships, bonuses, reduced rates for public services, and family allowances. The ISEE is calculated by adding the family income earned in the previous year and the portion derived from movable and immovable assets. The resulting value is then divided by a parameter that takes into account the size of the family unit, obtaining the final ISEE.

The 730 form can be submitted online without a substitute through the Revenue Agency website, using SPID, CIE, or CNS. The pre-filled form makes it easier to complete, automatically integrating the data held by the Tax Authority. The 730 form without a tax withholding agent represents a simple and convenient way to regularize one's tax position for all those taxpayers who do not have a tax withholding agent.
